Digital social innovation
#toolkit

The DSI Toolkit is a collaboratively developed toolkit that helps projects to scale in a sustainable way, generating a better impact.

The DSI scale

Helps to assess the DSI growth considering sharing, openness and societal good.

Peer knowledge

Wanna help other digital social innovators to scale? Share your knowledge!

Workshops

Workshops, events and meetups are organized all around Europe to built a DSI community-generated knowledge and promote social sustainable growth.

Latest workshop
Size matters?
31 May 2016, iMal, Brussels.

Next workshop
DSI Hunt
12 Oct 2016, Maker Faire Rome.
